title: Remove endorsement from backend model layer
description: Delete src/backend/app/models/endorsement.py entirely. Then edit src/backend/app/models/user.py to remove the TYPE_CHECKING import of Endorsement and the endorsements_received relationship (lines 27, 198-202). Then edit src/backend/app/models/__init__.py to remove the Endorsement import (line 4) and remove "Endorsement" from __all__ (line 28). Finally delete src/backend/app/seed/endorsements.py entirely and edit src/backend/app/seed/run.py to remove the Endorsement import, the DROP TABLE IF EXISTS endorsements line, and the endorsement seeding block.
acceptance_criteria:
- src/backend/app/models/endorsement.py does not exist
- src/backend/app/seed/endorsements.py does not exist
- No reference to endorsement in user.py, __init__.py, or run.py
- python -c "from app.models import User" succeeds
- python -c "from app.seed.run import main" succeeds (no import errors)
